title: Aimeos
desc: Laravel ecommerce package for ultra fast online shops, scalable marketplaces, complex B2B applications and #gigacommerce

title: Bagisto
desc: An easy to use, free and open source laravel eCommerce platform to build your online shop in no time.

title: Dolibarr ERP & CRM
desc: Dolibarr ERP CRM is an open source, free software package for companies of any size, foundations or freelancers. It includes different features for enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management but also other features for different activities.

title: Kaoto
desc: Kaoto is an open source integration editor with a user-friendly drag and drop interface. Use it to automate common tasks in your day-to-day ecommerce workflow.

title: Magento
desc: Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform written in PHP. It uses multiple other PHP frameworks such as Laminas and Symfony.

title: nopCommerce
desc: ASP.NET Core eCommerce software. nopCommerce is a free and open-source shopping cart.

title: Odoo Commerce
desc: Odoo is a suite of web based open source business apps.

title: Opencart
desc: A free shopping cart system. OpenCart is an open source PHP-based online e-commerce solution.

title: Optaplanner
desc: A fast, easy-to-use, open source AI constraint solver for software developers

title: OSCommerce
desc: OsCommerce is an e-commerce and online store-management software program. It can be used on any web server that has PHP and MySQL installed. It is available as free software under the GNU General Public License.

title: Pimcore
desc: Open Source Data & Experience Management Platform (PIM, MDM, CDP, DAM, DXP/CMS & Digital Commerce)

title: Prestashop
desc: PrestaShop is an Open Source e-commerce platform, committed to providing the best shopping cart experience for both merchants and customers.

title: Reaction
desc: Mailchimp Open Commerce is an API-first, headless commerce platform built using Node.js, React, GraphQL. Deployed via Docker and Kubernetes.

title: Saleor
desc: A modular, high performance, headless e-commerce platform built with Python, GraphQL, Django, and React.

title: Shopware
desc: Shopware 6 is an open commerce platform based on Symfony Framework and Vue and supported by a worldwide community and more then 1.500 community extensions.

title: Shuup
desc: E-Commerce Platform

title: Snipcart
desc: Add a shopping cart to any website.

title: Spree
desc: Open Source headless multi-language/multi-currency/multi-store eCommerce platform.

title: Solidus
desc: Rails eCommerce System

title: SuiteCRM
desc: Open source CRM for the world

title: Sylius
desc: Sylius is an Open Source Headless eCommerce Platform based on Symfony.

title: Valentina
desc: Valentina is a cross-platform patternmaking program which allows designers to create and model patterns of clothing. This software allows pattern creation, using either standard sizing tables or an individual’s set of measurements. It blends new technologies with traditional methods to create a unique pattern making tool.

title: Vendure
desc: A headless GraphQL ecommerce framework.

title: Woocommerce
desc: A customizable, open-source eCommerce platform built on WordPress. Build any commerce solution you can imagine.

title: Zen Cart
desc: Zen Cart® is a full-function e-commerce application for your website.
